Texts.Eng: ^orange;Vinalisj^reset; has given me the location of a ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;. I've marked the location ^green;in my ships SAIL^reset;.
^orange;Vinalisj^reset; has transmitted the location of a ^orange;Science Outpost^reset; to me. I've marked the location ^green;in my ships SAIL^reset;.
